name: Junk Dunk
description:
This game is built for  VR JAM 2022

Game Description

The game is about a kid who’s in his room chilling until his mom is about to pay a visit to do the spot check of the room and the kid is trying to clean up before mom walks in. 

Thank you for trying out the JUNK DUNK VR prototype. leave us your valuable input so we can improve further. 


Team
HyperLabz
